name: 20+ Canva Resources Notion Template
description: Interested in learning how to use the best graphic designing tool available today? Look no further. This Canva Resources template is a library of the best resources created by Educators showing how to create stunning Canva designs and sell them to start your first or next Side Hustle.What you Get InsideCanva Resources : BlogsVideosCourses And a Design Tracker to organise all your Canva designs in one place.And if you choose the PRO Plan, you get detailed resources on Making Money with your Canva
features: Social Media; Freelancing; Affiliate Marketing; Print on Demand; Those planning to learn Canva for learning Design
